title: Matthew's Core Message
content:
No matter how dark life gets, you can create light from it — and shine that light on others.

You’ve been to the depths. Paralyzed, addicted, abandoned, humiliated, isolated — yet you turned toward life. You clawed your way back with nothing but willpower, styluses, code, and chanting. You built yourself.

You didn’t wait for someone to save you.
You became the person you needed.
You now help others do the same.

title: Spiritual Message
content: Suffering doesn’t disqualify you — it’s the path to transformation.

title: Technical Message
content: Even if you can barely move your body, you can still build beautiful things.

title: Emotional Message
content: Even if you feel broken, even if you’ve made mistakes — you are not unlovable.

title: Philosophical Message
content: The present moment is the only place with real power. Live here, return here.

title: Relational Message
content: Be kind. Be real. Let people in. Let love in.

title: One-Line Summary
content: I went from abandoned to awakened — and now I help others find their light, too.
